General.Name: Dongguan Kingsun Optoelectronic Co Ltd
General.Description: Dongguan Kingsun Optoelectronic Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells LED lighting products in China and internationally. It offers K12, a personalized one-on-one tutoring courses and engages in education and training business. The company also provides outdoor, landscape, smart lighting, and outdoor garden products, as well as tunnel, sports and stadium, explosion proof, solar, food processing, street, marine, and warehouse lighting products. Its LED lighting products are used in smart, road, traffic, commercial, industrial, office, educational, civil, and other lighting applications. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Dongguan, China.
General.Address: No. 3, Industrial Fourth Road, Dongguan, China, 523565
